question: Who has been appointed as the next CEO of Vodafone group?
explanation: Vodafone Group has announced that Nick Read will be the next CEO of the company, succeeding Vittorio Colao. Colao steps down after just over 10 yrs in the job, during which he transformed Vodafone from a pure mobile player into a converged operator owning multiple cable & fibre networks. Vodafone owns & operates networks in 26 countries & has partner networks in over 50 additional countries.
